features.Dual-radii Cavity Proﬁle:

features.W-shaped Open Grooves: For efficient mud evacuation and hydroplaning protection on and off the road.

features.High Damage Resistance: Damage resistant turtle shell tread pattern to protect your tyre and suspension from bumps and potholes.

features.Optimized Central Blocks: A squared footprint that enhances traction and ensures even wear for optimal tyre use.

name: Endurace RT
description: For the trailblazers transforming trucking and haulage. The EnduRace RT is specially developed for heavy trailer usage and enables cost efficient operations through its strong construction that can support multiple retreads.

features.Wider Tread Design: Get superior mileage with long lasting, high strength tread blocks.

features.Stronger Sidewall Design:
A robust sidewall that is optimized for structural durability. 
 Extra wide scrub resistance shoulder

features.Scrub Reistant Compound: Strengthened rubber that withstands common scrubs during loading and unloading operations.

name: Endurace MA
tagline: Superior Handling at Lowest Cost Per Mile
description: A tyre to handle your goods and your haulage costs with care. The robust design and superior handling of ENDURACE MA keeps you on budget and on track on every road you travel.

features.4 Rib Robust Tread Design:
Optimized contact pressure technology with wider shoulder design to ensure better mileage. 
 Highest NSD in this category

features.Zig Zag Channelized Grooves:
With stress relieving sipes for increased grip during both dry and wet weather haulage runs. 
 Pressure distribution picture

features.Concussion Shield Technology:
Reduced stress in tyres through cord optimization to ensure structural integrity at highway speeds. 
 Steer Product with the Highest no of 2nd Retreads
